scripts.build-ios: sudo react-native bundle --platform ios --entry-file index.ios.js --bundle-output ./bundles/ios/index.ios.jsbundle --assets-dest ./bundles/ios --dev false
scripts.build-android: sudo react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.android.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res/ && sudo react-native bundle --platform android --entry-file index.android.js --bundle-output ./bundles/android/index.android.bundle --assets-dest ./bundles/android --dev false
scripts.build-all: npm run build-ios && npm run build-android
scripts.s-code-push-ios: code-push release rrkc_ios ./bundles/ios 1.2.7 --deploymentName Staging --description '热更新' --mandatory true
scripts.p-code-push-ios: code-push release rrkc_ios ./bundles/ios 1.2.7 --deploymentName Production --description '20180731修改提交设备指纹逻辑' --mandatory true
scripts.s-code-push-android: code-push release rrkc_android ./bundles/android 1.2.7 --deploymentName Staging --description '热更新' --mandatory true
scripts.p-code-push-android: code-push release rrkc_android ./bundles/android 1.2.7 --deploymentName Production --description '20180731修改提交设备指纹逻辑' --mandatory true
scripts.s-ios-all: npm run build-ios && npm run s-code-push-ios
scripts.p-ios-all: npm run build-ios && npm run p-code-push-ios
scripts.s-android-all: npm run build-android && npm run s-code-push-android
scripts.p-android-all: npm run build-android && npm run p-code-push-android
scripts.s-all: npm run build-ios && npm run s-code-push-ios && npm run build-android && npm run s-code-push-android
scripts.p-all: npm run build-ios && npm run p-code-push-ios && npm run build-android && npm run p-code-push-android
